name: Cardiff Comics Carnival 2020 - Self Isolation Virtual Experience
name_original: Cardiff Comics Carnival 2020 - Self Isolation Virtual Experience
description:
Cardiff Comics Carnival returns this year at its new venue: your home!  Cardiff's premiere independent comic show was postponed indefinitely this March due to a worldwide pandemic, but this virtual self-isolation experience utilises cutting edge Interactive Fiction technology (text, some pictures) to bring CCC 2020 directly to you.

+ ATTEND a day-long celebration of small press comics, zines and artwork, featuring some of the best comics talent from South Wales and beyond.

+ PERUSE & BUY  a selection of works from CCC 2020's hardworking exhibitors. Support the scene and get some comics!

+ SOAK IN all the atmosphere of a real-life comics show - complete with a working bar, toilet amenities and a plethora of realistic interactions with exhibitors and fellow patrons alike!

Visit Cardiff Comics Carnival on Twitter, Instagram or Facebook, or go to the Carp Publishing Endeavours site here!
